reviews.review_text: I came in to purchase a Samsung QLED TV and was helped by George Chaplin. He was very knowledgeable and patient with us while walking through our different options. George definitely went above and beyond to provide us with the best service. Thank you George for your help, we really appreciate it!

Definitely a memorable experience with Rhythm the store manager.  We happened to go into the store looking at purchasing a fireplace that we had to special order.  While we were there we saw that you had a better deal for the Frame TV 65 inch that we purchased the day before from Bestbuy.  It wasn t too much of a difference in price but the service was definitely different.  He explained more details about the TV and told us why we should buy the warranty.  I told him that we didn t buy the warranty at Best Buy because they didn t really have anyone that s was experienced enough to sell me the warranty other than telling me what the price was.  So with that said he spent the time with us gave us all the benefits about the TV and explained to us that if we bought the 5 year warranty and didn t use the warranty in 5 years that we would get a store credit to buy anything we wanted in the store. This definitely was a great selling feature and after that experience we bought the TV with the warranty from Rhythm and told him we will pay first and pick up the TV tomorrow as we needed to return the TV we bought from Bestbuy first as we didn t have space.  Thank you for a wonderful experience and we will definitely be buying more from Rhythm from SE marine Drive Visions. Thanks, Donald

I am glad that George pick up my call when I call in for stock check. He has been very helpful providing professional advice on choosing the right TV for my home. He went through all possible options for my need. Being a responsible adviser and documentation was fast when I need to adjust my order detail. Great purchase with great price!

We have been shopping at Visions Electronics on Marine Drive with George for 15 years.  We have bought all our TVs from George and our parents too.  With George s knowledge and experience each TV got better and better including our newest one last week. The picture is incredible.  We know we can rely on George and his excellent service.

Excellent sale on Nikon binoculars at Visions on Marine Drive in south Vancouver. Very friendly and helpful sales person - got all my info quickly, and when I got home there was already an email with the invoice and order (special order item!). And the store was roomy enough that I could take my bicycle in, without getting in the way of customers or staff. Would highly recommend.

Rythum and the team at visions helped me equip my home with tv s, sound bars and other equipment, Process was easy from start to finish and Rythum was very patient and informative on the topic and products. He also price matched a competitors price and was able to get me installation a lot sooner, All in all, What a wonderful experience and I will be shopping here again soon, Thanks Visions!

George Chaplain helped me with the purchase of a tv and wall mount.  It s been a over a decade since my last purchase. Needless to say I m not very tech savvy, so it s taken me awhile to get to all the features. When I needed help months after the purchase, George came through once again with his exemplary customer.  I felt like a valued customer long after my purchase and will return for any future audio visual purchases.

I have bought many TVs and projectors from Visions throughout  the years. I keep coming back because of George Chaplin. He is an exceptional salesman. He is quite knowledgeable and will not try to upsell. He will put in the work to find you the best product for your needs and budget. If you go to Visions, you should definitely work with George.

We worked with George to help meet tight space and more so budget considerations for a TV for our family room.  George provided sound guidance which helped us select an LG 48  OLED.  We feel that he has helped to give us a solution which will serve our needs for quite some time. George is a Good Man, very knowledgeable and was both considerate and patient with us.

For any and all TV related needs see George Chaplin at this store. Very experienced and very knowledgeable! He gave me a great deal on my new Hisense TV. He was even helped me get it into my truck. Will be back just because of him! Thanks again George for all the help!
George was extremely helpful in my purchase of a new TV. He explained the differences between several different screens in my price range. Overall, it was a very pleasant experience.

I needed 3 TVs delivered and installed on very short notice. The entire team at Visions worked together to have all items delivered and installed in my home within 48 hours. George was a pleasure to work with in making my purchases, and Ken showed up on time, and quickly and professionally installed all of the pieces. The also matched the competitive prices I had seen in the market. Absolutely recommend working with Visions, they will be my only tech provider moving forward.
Don t hesitate to check for lowest prices in the market. George is a great sales executive and will offer you the best service and price. I bought an OLED from George with unbeatable price.

Excellent service from George Chaplin from start to finish.  Knows the products, finds the best deal for the money you can spend and works with you to figure out all the angles.  I had my new TV installed on the wall.  The service tech was excellent, polite, and knowledgeable and installed the new TV beautifully without issue.  I will definitely be returning for any new purchases

My wife and I had a great experience buying a pair of floor standing speakers and television from George at Visions SE Marine Drive. George was attentive, patient, and knowledgeable. We are super happy with our new 2.0 home theatre set-up and owe a big thanks to George! A++

George was my salesperson, very knowledgeable, he mentioned over 40 years in the business, I was looking for a 4K 55 TV he found my budget and what I was looking for in name brands and instead of trying to upsale me to a higher price TV out of my  budget, he pointed me towards a nice 70 RCA 4K TV within my budget. He let me know me know about in home extended warranty on this brand and broke it down to a per month cost. He answered all my questions and treated me like I was spending more than I was. Its my second purchase from Visions Vancouver Store and will be my preferred store for future purchases.
Bought my samsung fast charger on a very good discount. They often have heavy discounts on some good products, which are not found in big stores. Keep an eye on their flyer for deals

Just purchased a Hisence portable AC unit from Visions on Marine Drive. Amazing salesman named George Chaplin helped guide me through selecting the right model for  my apartment, and resolved the window issues I was facing with some great solutions I wouldnt have dreamed of. Georges wisdom and decades if product knowledge and sales experience was such a bonus for me. So much nicer to deal with a seasoned salesman, than many of the younger folks I have to deal with who have no idea what they are talking about these days. Thank you George, you are worth your weight in gold!  I will be a repeat customer really soon.   Kelly L.
Bought a Samsung 76 inch TV from the Vancouver Marine Drive location. Staff was great snd George went above and beyond. Would definitely recommend and buy again from them.

I needed a very large projector and screen for my event venue and was on a short deadline.  I called Visions Electronics and they connected me to a gentleman name George. He was very attentive and understood what I wanted and the budget I was looking to work within. He not only helped me find a great product within my budget; he also found me an installer that could install the projector and screen within my deadline. He called me every step of the way to ask me questions and ensure everything was set and ready to go, including mounting equipment, measurements, timeline, installer schedule and a follow up call.  I am very impressed and would recommend asking for George at Visions Electronics anytime you are looking for someone with genuine experience.   Appreciate the help George; couldnt be happier with my product.

George, our sales representative was most helpful, patient and polite.  George experience in his chosen field made our decision making less difficult and his vast knowledge was most impressive.  George is quiet and polite and most importantly, listens to the customer. It wasnt our first experience with George and hopefully, not our last. A gentleman and a credit to all who are served by this gentleman. E.S.

Quite unexpectantly we decided to buy an LG OLED65G3 TV in July 2023. Our salesman, again was George Chaplin. This time there were quite severe problems with supply but George stuck with it and delivered our TV in a reasonable time. George worked seriously hard on our behalf and we are grateful to him for that. We also appreciate the help of other people in Visions Electronics who came to Georges aid. We recently purchased an LG OLED65G2 television from this store. Our salesman was George and our installer was Ken. George had to put up with my changing my mind on a few things. With great courtesy he dealt with all of this and visited our home twice to sort out all the purchase details. Very smooth sailing. George could not have been better. The installation by Ken was, prompt, courteous and impeccable. Nothing could have been improved. Our thanks to both of them. By the way, the G2 has lived up to the reviews.
I liked purchasing from Vision. They have good deals, specially in TVs . Staff are nice specially George is good guy there. He is so helpful
I recently came in to get some help with some speakers. George went above and beyond to make sure that I had all my questions answered, and supported me with a very good buying decision.

I recently bought a Sony Bravia TV from Visions. The shop representative, Mr George Chaplin provided me with valuable suggestions on the purchase and helped me take the right decision based on the specifications and my requirements. The process was fast and George was patient and responsive throughout. Highly recommend meeting George if you are in this store. Product prices were competitive and even a few dollars less than Amazon or Best Buy. Good experience overall.

I don t often write reviews, however, I feel compelled to do so this time. I was recently purchasing a large-screen TV on behalf of my daughter and the service provided by George Chaplin was simply outstanding. George offered me a number of options both via e-mail and in person, always making himself available and answering questions thoroughly and knowledgeably.  Customer service  is George s calling card and he delivered as promised. If in the market for a new TV and/or other electronics, I highly recommend George as your  go-to  advisor/salesperson. You won t be disappointed.

Always a great shopping experience. My favourite salesperson by far is George Chaplin. Very knowledgeable. Once we settled on TV size and price point range George quickly narrowed choices and arranged a deal better than anywhere else in town. Great TV. Great price. I will be back for more. Thanks George.

After 16 years our old tube TV broke down,  so we decided to go to Visons  Electronics on Marine Drive. We were very fortunate to have George Chaplin as our Sales Consultant.  He was so knowledgeable and extremely helpful and patient while we were making our decision on what to purchase.  He personally came to our home to hook up our VCR, and DVD Player and set the color of our TV perfectly. We appreciate very much this excellent service. Thank you George!

Good Customer Service and Competitive Prices. I was looking for a specific model of Samsung TV with that reason visited at Visions Marine Drive for the first time. Excellent prices around black friday weekend, but unfortunately my model was on pre-order . George Chaplin and Francis Yue are very knowledgeable and they understood my needs as well as my budget. Handled my queries in a very professional manner. Got a very good deal and Im very Happy with that. If you are looking for a TV : BIGGER THE BETTER. The Big Boy is finally here after one month of wait,  I am very satisfied with my 75 inches QLED TV Purchase.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Param, Thank you for sharing your kind words with us. George and Francis are two hard-working members of the Visions Electronics family, and we appreciate you taking the time to give them a pat on the back. Thank you for the business. We look forward to your next visit. --Visions Social Media Team

reviews.review_text: I bought subwoofer and amplifier last week. I really appreciate to vision s sales manager Rhythm who helped me to make a best decision ever.
I had a warranty claim to make on my Sony A80J and George made the process really easy for me. Thanks again George!

Excellent service from George Chaplin at Visions - he let me test the two speakers I was considering and helped me select the best speaker at the best price - in this case the new Kef LS50 Metas. He got me the colour model I was after and had them shipped super quickly. Top tier service - thank you!

I purchased a sound bar and sub woofer from George Chaplin at Vision on SE Marine Drive.  George provided superior customer service and his knowledge of TV s and home theatre systems is exceptional.  I have been dealing with George since 2015and highly recommend him if you need any electronics. Kerry

My husband and I purchased our LG OLED TV at the Marine drive Vancouver Visions store. We dealt with Rhythm as we had a positive experience when we purchased our previous TV from him. Rhythm really took the time to show us the differences between QLED and OLED tvs and explained things in an honest, no nonsense way, which we appreciated. In the end, we decided on the LG OLED and Rhythm gave us a good deal. He followed up with us the next week to make sure the setup went well and ensure that we liked our TV. A great experience. Well come back to Visions for future purchases.

If you are looking for Home audio equipment and speakers, go see George at Visions on Marine drive. Great guy and great sales person.  They have a big selection on display and you can listen, feel and look at everything in person, its great.  On-top of that they will always try and get you the best price. Thank you George, Im loving my new KEF LS50 meta speakers.
Big thank you to Rhythm for his knowledge and recommendations in finding the perfect tv! Always provides the best service and experience!

Just got the Sonos arc there, awesome service, special thanks to George for great service and explanation of the product and recommendations.  Definitely looking forward to coming back for another product.

I just bought a TV at Vision from the Vancouver location. After looking around and getting information from other stores I was very Happy after getting helped out bye George Chaplin not only was he supper knowledgeable about the tv and surround sound but spent almost 2 hours walking me through with all the comparisons and fine details. Very professional and patient. Great person and great attitude. I would also like to add the TV and surround sound installer  KEN  really went out of his way and did a very clean great job. I m very happy and would definitely recommend dealing with these guys! Great Job!

I recently pre-ordered a Sony TV from George Chaplin at the Vancouver location, as supply chains were a concern.  George was knowledgeable, approachable and kept in contact with me until the day the TV arrived.  There was a price drop that I was eligible for after the purchase, and I received a gift card for the price difference. I would have preferred the cash, but was happy that the store honoured their price protection guarantee.  Buying from a smaller, local store reminded me how good customer service USED to be. I will definitely bring my business back.

I visited this Vision to buy a KEF Q350 in White. I called before coming in. I spoke with George Chaplin and he suggested to come and borrow their White speakers until mine was shipped to store. He was kind and very helpful. George went as far as to offer to drive to my home to deliver the speakers and collect demo ones personally. This level of service these days in rare. Based on this experience, I will be suggesting George to my friends and reader of this review. A lot of times it s not the store but a particular employee that makes the difference. George is that employee.
George Chaplin was very informative & helpful when we we re trying to resolve our audio issues.  We will purchase any future electronics from Visions because the customer service is great.

Fantastic service provided by Visions on Marine Dr! George Chaplin was the reason we came back to buy our second TV and he helped us make our final decision on taking home our Samsung QOLED. We couldn t be happier! I highly recommend going to see George. He knows his stuff. Rythem is the Sales Manager and he was also super helpful! We had a return that was somewhat complicated and between Rythem & George it was a breeze on our end. We will be shopping at Visions for years to come.
A very good retail experience with George at Vision Electronics. Great troubleshooting, good communication and follow up. Thank you George.

George helped me to purchase two Samsung TVs; QN92B, 85  and 55  in April 2023 and ken installed both of them. I am so satisfied with the professional services rendered to me by both George and Ken and would like  to appreciate their professional and concise help and supports; excellent

If you are looking for a place with service beyond expectations, you re in the right place. George Chaplin - Vision Vancouver SE Marine Drive s best kept secret. George was relentless until a proper solution was found and everything resolved for us. We purchased our surround sound equipment from them and he made sure it met our needs. I would not hesitate to return . Definitely endorsing this store.
Rhythm Mahajan was amazing with his knowledge and support helping me with my purchase.I m very thankful and appreciative.

We went into Visions and were helped by George. We were very pleased by his driven nature and eagerness to get our TV on time for an event. He went above and beyond calling other locations and communicating with his team (and us) every step of the way to ensure we would have our ideal New Year s eve :) We were not expecting much given the short time frame, but his keenness and diligence made it happen. Thanks George!

Really good service and great price here. Special thanks to George who gave me quite a few helpful advice on choosing the right product. I am looking for a TV and he absolutely is an expert on the products that they carry. He also provided a lot of tips on installation and transportation, super diligent and professional.

George at Marine Dr Visions patiently walked us through various models while we were shopping for a new TV for our basement. Can t appreciate more for his professionalism and personal touch of great customer service. Definitely will come back for future purchases and highly recommend him to our friends and families.

My Girlfriend and I were visiting from Penticton when we came to this Visions Location for their Cyber Monday sale. We had been eyeing up a Samsung Frame for the longest time and finally saw a friendlier price with some extras that we couldn t resist. They unfortunately did not have the TV in stock and we were leaving the next day. George Chaplin went above and beyond what we expected. It did take a few weeks for the TV to come in but George had everything organized for pick up at their Kelowna store. He stayed in communication with us the whole time ensuring the process was as smooth as possible. Thanks again George.

I have purchased all my electronics at Visions on Marine Drive for many years. They have always given me the best prices - and I do look at other online sites . Seriously if you are looking at audiovisual equipment the only person to talk to is George Chapman . He is incredibly knowledgeable and will tell you what products perform best in each price range . On this occasion he moved mountains to get me what I wanted  - and on time !! He even gave me his personal cell  number if there were problems day or night ! One thing you should know is that if you pay the extra for an extended warranty - You get the money back as an in store credit if you did not use the warranty. I always get the extended warranty these days . Thanks George you re the man !

Had the privilege to deal with the superb sales rep, George Chaplin. I ordered a camera that was incredibly hard to find and George provided weekly updates and excellent customer service throughout.  10/10 would highly recommend.

I can t speak highly enough about the customer care provided by George at Visions on Marine Drive. I wasn t the easiest customer to deal with, I was just starting my foray into higher-end hifi gear and the gaps in my knowledge were palpable. George has a huge wealth of knowledge  born from decades of experience and he handled my bombardment of questions with patience and kindness. I am indebted to him for his help and recommend that anybody in a similar situation look him up, you won t regret. 10/10

Rhythm was amazing to deal with.  He was extremely responsive and went the extra mile to provide me with excellent equipment at a competitive price and to assist in every other way that he could!  Would happy buy from him again!

George Chaplin helped us purchase our new TV. He was very knowledgeable, informative,  and super friendly.  We didnt feel pressure to purchase,  but felt confident when we pulled the trigger. We are very happy with our new OLED TV.

First time in the store today.  Did some more research, came back and walked out with 3TVs.  The service provided was surprisingly excellent with staff being attentive, friendly, knowing their product details well (we all do our research these days, don t we), and were very personable and responsive (gave their cell contact info).  The prices were great  comparable to bigger stores and the service much better.  They were clearly  keen (unlike some stores that just don t seem to care) to win my business and make the customer happy.  I ll be back.  Nice work Visions team!

I d like to say a huge thanks to George at Visions on SE marine drive. He was incredibly helpful and patient with my partner and I while we were deciding which hifi system we d like to purchase. 10/10 service, highly recommend paying George a visit.

I had a really great buying experience here, which was helped out a lot by George Chaplin. George was knowledgeable about the products and efficient with my time, without rushing me through the store. He showed me various TVs and their differing capabilities and functions. Overall, I felt that he was generous with his time and knowledge. I would definitely recommend him and Visions generally.

I recently went to Visions on SW Marine Drive with my mother to shop for a tv. George Chaplin was very knowledgeable and he was even more patient as my mother could not make up her mind. He showed us the difference on the quality of cheaper models vs more expensive models, spent well over an hour with us explaining the differences. Even if my mother changed her mind, I would have bought a tv from him bc of his patience and understanding. Visions is very fortunate to have such a dedicated worker. We bought our TV with confidence. Thanks again George and HNY!

After always purchasing electronics from BestBuy, we decided to try Visions and were blown away by the experience, specifically speaking with George Chaplin. His knowledge was so evident, but what impressed us so much was his care and customer service, ensuring every little detail for us was perfect, both during the purchase and afterwards for delivery. Man is a living legend when it comes to TV sales.. could not recommend enough! Thank you again George!

My wife and I recently bought 2 new OLED TVs from Visions Electronics, and I have to say that George Chaplin made it such a positive, easy experience. He was so friendly and helpful, it really felt like he was trying to help us. This time of the year can be quite busy and hectic, but he did his best to make sure our sale and installation went through very quickly. If you re going to Visions, be sure to ask for George, you will not be disappointed. Thanks again for your help, George.

The service experience we had with George was exceptional. He was  very helpful, accommodating and knowledgeable about electronics. We got a huge discount for both TV we bought last week. We even get a bonus gift which made our day. I will definitely recommend him to friends and relatives.
George went the extra mile for me. I was frantically trying to locate an Otter box case for my 13 mini. He searched & found the only one in stock!

Excellent customer service and best prices! I went in here to get some air conditioners, they were so incredibly helpful with good advice and with loading my purchases into my vehicle. They really went above and beyond to make sure I got exactly what I needed. They also worked hard to make sure that I was able to fit it all in my car, and they were so pleasant and kind throughout. I highly recommend this shop! Thank you!

We visited the Visions Vancouver SE Marine Dr location for the first time to buy a portable AC unit.   The sales  associate George Chaplain provided us with the most exceptional customer service.  George took the time to call several stores to check for availability and finally tried to secure one for us from their warehouse.  He told us he would keep us updated via email to confirm availability which he did diligently.   We were informed every step of the way.  We would highly recommend shopping at Visions and we truly appreciated George taking the time to show care for his customers!

Amazing price and top notch service!!! Recently bought a pair of floor standing speakers, but one was damaged upon opening. George helped me order a replacement one immediately, and follow up / update the status PROACTIVELY . Never felt left in the dark, not knowing where is my speaker. Thats top notch service!!! If you want great price, talk to them, you will be amazed!!!
Very satisfied with the product and the customer service.  George was very helpful in getting us a great deal and ensuring that we received our back-ordered items.
we are lucky that George Chaplin always seems to be available on our last visit George was a problem solver . I would be happy to recommend him whenever I have the chance.

Visions on SE Marine Drive provides such excellent customer care we will definitely be coming back here again for our electronics needs. The store manager was very knowledgeable, helpful, and honest in helping us select what we needed and getting us a great price as well. 10/10

Just purchased 3 Tvs from George at Visions. He was great, very knowledgeable and patient, as I could not decide what to purchase.. He went well beyond my exceptions. Very nice man  so make sure when you go to vision s in Vancouver ask for George.

Customer service is excellent.Fenil and George helped me with easy transaction. I bought jbl earbuds for a very low price because of the price matching. Weve been buying our electronics here and we dont have any problems with the transactions. Theyre manager, Ritham , is doing excellent service to their customers. I highly recommend them.

I had a great customer experience with George Chaplin at Visions on Marine Drive in Vancouver. He was super helpful and responsive and went out of his way to make sure I got great deals on all my AV devices, and that any stock or DOA problems got resolved as quickly as possible, all under warranty. I highly recommend him for your AVR needs. Thank SO much, George!

Customer service is becoming a lost skill, but ask for George.  His product knowledge is excellent and hes not pushy.  I thought I had researched everything I needed but he pointed out some flaws and I have a great system because of it!  Thanks George!

Tuesday, February 21,2023    I was at VISIONS ELECTRONICS on Tuesday, February 14, 2023   I wanted to acknowledge salesperson GEORGE CHAPLIN audio/video department with my purchase of a DENON audio/video receiver.  He was very friendly, courteous and helpful in  recommending the the DENON. He also helped setting up delivery and installation of the receiver. I hope GEORGE gets the proper acknowledgement for a job well done.    Also the delivery and installer KEN was friendly, courteous, patient and excellent in explaining how to use the remote control for the DENON RECEIVER. KEN did a fantastic job of hooking all the electronic equipment to the receiver.    A very enjoyable experience with VISIONS ELECTRONICS      A very satisfied customer.     Thank You

Ive been a Bell customer for years and a Vision Electronics customer for much longer. When I was due to up grade my cell phones, (My small business has 4 phones). I went to Visions on Marine. I discovered Visions had a top customer service specialist for Smart Phones from Bell and I bought my phones and plan from him. Im old school computer guy and not as savy with apps and data plans. Fenil  was very smart, fast and trustworthy. He made it easy to migrate my  multiple person phone plan. Double thumbs up.

George Chaplin is a knowledgeable, trustworthy,  reliable and low pressure salesman who has been able to get me exactly what I need quickly and for the best price.  Great communication.  Thank you, George!

I had a great experience working with George Chaplin at Visions Electronics. I looked everywhere for a Fuji Film X100V and couldn t find one in stock anywhere. George was able to quickly locate and order one for me, and it arrived in just over a week. I ve it for a couple weeks now and I am so happy with it. Thanks George!!

Definitely the best visions customer service out of most of them out there. Everyone is very helpful and friendly. Was looking to buy a new tv and soundbar. Exciting day! Unfortunately my exciting day came to an end as the popular sound bar was out of stock... at this location. Thanks to George he found one for me at another location so I ended up getting everything I needed on the same day for a decent deal. Was impressed with Georges customer service. Great experience as always. Loving my new set up.

Rythem who is the manager at this store is the person you want to be talking to when buying anything! He helped me get the best speaker system for my car and his customer service is on point. Can t get any better than that. Thanks Rythem

The staff here are very helpful, feel free to ask them questions about anything you would like to know about especially TVs or they even have flexible flexiti monthly payment plans that you can get easily approved for . Cellphone plans change from month to month but a bonus is you get a visions promo card which you can use to buy anything in the store .
Salesman George s knowledge of Televisions was very helpful with my recent purchase! I would recommend his services and return to Visions for any future needs.

If you are buying an appliance or need any information George is THE BEST representative at the SW Marine location. George genuinely cares about his costumers and called me not once, but twice to remind me to pick up an item that I ordered. He really made my experience so easy and painless. Thank you!

Had a very pleasant TV buying experience with Rhthym M, manager at SE Marine Drive location.  3rd TV I m buying from Visions now and very happy with the service!  Super happy with our TV and the service we received

We visited the Visions Vancouver SE Marine Dr location for the first time to buy a refrigerator.  George Chaplain the client advisor provided us with the most exceptional customer service. We desperately needed a new refrigerator since the old one is completely not working for weeks in these hottest summer days.  Thank you George for taking the efforts to make everything happen!!! Very appreciate it!!!

If you are looking for a place with service beyond expectations, you re in the right place.  Vision Vancouver SE Marine Drive s best kept secret. Rahul Singh was relentless until a proper solution was found and everything resolved for us. We purchased our surround sound equipment from them and he made sure it met our needs

Ive been shopping at the Marine Dr location for over 10 years and couldnt be happier with the service George Chaplin has provided me! Hes extremely knowledgeable and is so helpful when Im being indecisive. Its nice to walk into a store and be greeted by name. I highly recommend going to see George at Marine Drive.

Highly recommend dealing with George C. at the Marine Drive location. He is very personable, knowledgeable and as honest as they come. First off,  George listened to what I was looking for and made my buying experience very easy, with no regrets. He directed to me what I needed, didnt oversell. In what was a absolute fluke and a rare occurrence, the TV I bought had a small manufacturing issue with the display and I called George up and told him about the issue. George dealt with manufacture right away getting me a replacement TV! When I was at the store getting new TV many store employees stopped by unsolicited and commented on my choice of TV (it was based on Georges recommendation) and true to his word, everyone backed up what George said without prompting... saying they would have made same purchase themselves. No 2nd guessing or buyers remorse.... very happy with purchase, service and now feel I have a trusted contact for my electronic needs without worrying about BS and being oversold or not getting what I need! Thanks George!

Every time I have to buy electronics, only one spot comes to my mind ie. Vision electronics Marine drive. I really appreciate how the manager of this store- Rhythm helps me find outstanding products and deals. I would highly recommend visiting him to get the desired and excellent customer service.

The staff was polite and welcoming. They didnt hover at arms length when I told them I was just looking around. When I did need service, they were knowledgeable of there products and willing to offer alternative products from the same manufacturer as well as competing manufacturers. I wasnt pressured to buy on the spot. I was able to get a price for an item and leave. I thought it over and returned to buy what I wanted at a price I was happy with. I ended up buying 2 sets of Kef speakers plus a set of in wall speakers. Thanks to Rhythm and staff for the great service and pricing on the products I wanted. I will continue to recommend your store to those looking for electronics.

This was our first time visiting the Vancouver Store. We were looking for a induction range that I had already researched online. Fortunately we met George who assisted us in answering our questions promptly. We were looking at not getting our range until March which we reluctantly accepted. A few days later we received a call from George saying that he had found the range we were looking for and further it was in the Lower Mainland and he had secured it for us.  This came totally unexpected  so we were very happy.  George kept in touch with us until the range was delivered and he became an advocate for us when there was a problem with the delivery.  I will be going back to Visions for future purchases for a project that I am working on and George will be the sales assistant that I will be dealing with.  Superior customer service goes a long way.

After the purchase of a second-hand tv had gone wrong, I phoned Visions Electronics, and spoke to a salesman named George. I was waiting on the old tvs buyer before I could come down, but George stayed late so that he would be there to help me. He made sure I got the TV that was the best fit for my budget and priorities, and even got me a discount on the warranty. Plus he was also just really nice, which helps! Id buy from Visions again anytime. I love my LG smart tv, and George made it an easy decision to make.

My son and me went to Vision Marine Drive Nov 13, 2022. This saleman FENIL gave us an awesome customer services. He is so great and very helpful. Vision should keep a young professional liked him. He gave us 100% customer satisfaction. Well deserved to have an honest to goodness review of him.

Went in on a whim, and found myself leaving very satisfied with the television George helped me pick out! He was knowledgable, patient, and had me leaving confident and happy about my decision! Thanks, George!

We want to thank George Chaplin for the superb service he gave us when we came in looking for a new television. We didnt know exactly what we wanted when we came in but Georges professional and friendly manner made our shopping experience exceptional. He listened to our questions and answered them in a way that we could understand. He explained all of the different technologies and never pressured us to make a purchase or add anything to a package. He never tried to sell us anything that he felt we did not need. It was such a pleasure meeting someone who listens to his customers and and seems to thoroughly enjoy his job. We will definitely send friends and acquaintances to see George should they be looking for any advice in electronics. New, Dedicated Visions Vancouver Marine Drive.

I bought a fantastic television here from George Chaplin, he was very helpful and nice in finding the TV for me and getting a great deal for it! If you re looking for electronics like a TV you may want to ask for him. He will do everything he can to make the experience work!

I only write reviews except when Im very impressed and someones efforts are worth making note of.  Ive recently purchased a TV and sound bar from Rhythm, the Sales Manager at this location.  He definitely got me a better price than anywhere else and he was available 24/7 by cell phone for any questions I had.  Whether youre looking to buy electronics from Costco or another competitor, I would encourage you to speak with Rhythm before doing so.  Hell set you up with a better deal and better customer service.

Awesome service from Erik! I went to place an order for an MSI laptop that was out of stock at their location and was told it would take about a couple weeks for them to bring one in for me. He price matched it for me as I saw a cheaper price at another competitor. I received a phone call promptly when my order arrived and that was just under two weeks. I went in to pickup my laptop the next day, and it came in a brand new original box, which was nice. Knowing that it might probably be convenient to have something to store it if I tuck it inside my closet or bring it out to a coffee shop, I decided to shop for a laptop sleeve before I left. The sleeves they had were not on sale, and Erik checked into the computer anyways to double check. I was going to wait until the price drops before I buy as the sleeve was a little pricey, but Erik offered to ask his manager without hesitation to see if he could offer me a lower price for it, and the manager just came to me and offered me $10 discount! He explained to me the sleeve is a nice brand and of very good quality. It had a compartment and a front pocket with convenient slots, so I decided to buy it. Erik went out of his way to help me the whole time! Both members were fantastic and very helpful; they made my day. I had the laptop for a week now and I still love it! It feels well built and performs so well as expected for gaming. Price was amazing.

Advertised discounted special on Sony 55 inch television. Store contacted by phone; did not have it in stock but searched and found it at another location. Prompt delivery arranged with professional set up. Very satisfactory experience with Raj at the store and Ken who delivered and set it up.

Just bought 2 HiSense TV s there. They are very good value for money and look great. I did have some issues with the panel on one 65inch and contacted George, the sales person who sold it to me. He worked to quickly get it resolved and got me a new TV right away. Also took the time to test it in store to ensure there were no problems and even offered me a different model if I wanted to consider that. I had been planning to buy online and glad I didn t for a major purchase like this. Would definitely buy from George and Visions again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David, Thank you for your kind words. George is a wonderful addition to the Visions Electronics family, full of great advice and a burning desire to save our valued guests as much of their hard-earned dollars as possible. Thank you for the business. We look forward to your next visit. --Visions Social Media Team

reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this place. My boyfriend and I were looking for an 8K TV and a washer & dryer. We were shopping here during Boxing Week and what I really liked is that all their prices either matched or were lower than Best Buys on the exact same items, which made me trust making my purchases from here. Rhythm and his team spent lots of time with us to help us make the most informed decisions and scheduled delivery and installation for us too. Everything arrived on time and the installers they sent over were also very professional and patient. They were very careful with our items and tested everything to ensure we were happy with our new purchases.
